trans-unit.source: Saves the specified key and all of its subkeys and values to a new file, in the standard format

seg-source.mrk: Saves the specified key and all of its subkeys and values to a new file, in the standard format

target.mrk: Saves the specified key and all of its subkeys and values to a new file, in the standard format

trans-unit.source: Handle to an open registry key.

seg-source.mrk: Handle to an open registry key.

target.mrk: Handle to an open registry key.

trans-unit.source: The name of the file in which the specified key and subkeys are to be saved.

seg-source.mrk: The name of the file in which the specified key and subkeys are to be saved.

target.mrk: The name of the file in which the specified key and subkeys are to be saved.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies whether to replace the file if it already exists, valid values:

seg-source.mrk: Specifies whether to replace the file if it already exists, valid values:

target.mrk: Specifies whether to replace the file if it already exists, valid values:

trans-unit.source: True - The function attempts to replace the existing file.

seg-source.mrk: True - The function attempts to replace the existing file.

target.mrk: True - The function attempts to replace the existing file.

trans-unit.source: False - The function fails if the file already exists (Default).

seg-source.mrk: False - The function fails if the file already exists (Default).

target.mrk: False - The function fails if the file already exists (Default).

trans-unit.source: [optional] $tagSECURITY_ATTRIBUTES structure that specifies a security descriptor for the new file. If this

seg-source.mrk: $tagSECURITY_ATTRIBUTES structure that specifies a security descriptor for the new file.

target.mrk: $tagSECURITY_ATTRIBUTES structure that specifies a security descriptor for the new file.

trans-unit.source: parameter is 0 (Default), the file gets a default security descriptor.

seg-source.mrk: parameter is 0 (Default), the file gets a default security descriptor.

target.mrk: parameter is 0 (Default), the file gets a default security descriptor.

trans-unit.source: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the system error code.

seg-source.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the system error code.

target.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the system error code.

trans-unit.source: The calling process must have $SE_BACKUP_NAME privilege, otherwise, the function fails, and _WinAPI_GetLastError()

target.mrk: The calling process must have $SE_BACKUP_NAME privilege, otherwise, the function fails, and _WinAPI_GetLastError()

trans-unit.source: You can use the file created by this function in subsequent calls to the _WinAPI_RegRestoreKey() functions.

target.mrk: You can use the file created by this function in subsequent calls to the _WinAPI_RegRestoreKey() functions.
